name: Slime Jumper (itch) (Jimakiad)
description:
Jump high in the Sky! This little slime has a dream of reaching as high as it gets! He mounts the clouds and tries to go where no slime has ever gone before! 

Try and get the best high-score you can get and be the best jumping slime to ever cross the planet!

Graphics and code were made by Jimakiad, SFX and the looped background music are royalty free music from the Unity Asset Store.

To control the Slime use the directional keys for Left And Right on the keyboard. This game can only be played with the keyboard and not with any gamepad.

This project was made for "My First Game Jam".
